com.orbischallenge.atz.utils

Class PointUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for point operations. Created by Orbis Access (Canada) Ltd. on 09/06/2016.

    • Method Detail

      • isAInlineWithB

        public static boolean isAInlineWithB(Point a,
                     Point b)
        Returns true iff the given points have a straight, tile based line between them. That is, you can get from Point a to Point b (or vice-versa) by moving in only one of the 8 cardinal directions from the Direction enum.
        Parameters:
        a - Point a
        b - Point b

      • minimumMovesBetween

        @Deprecated
public static int minimumMovesBetween(Point a,
                                 Point b)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated. Use chebyshevDistance(Point, Point)

      • chebyshevDistance

        public static int chebyshevDistance(Point a,
                    Point b)
        Returns the Chebyshev (or chessboard) distance between the two given points.

        This is also the minimum number of moves that must be made to reach point b from point a or vice versa, assuming there are no obstacles in the way.

        Parameters:
        a - The starting point
        b - The destination point
